Item ID11232

Dragon dart tips are used in the making of dragon darts. At level 95 Fletching, they can be made into dragon darts by adding feathers. Fletching a set of 10 will provide 250 experience (10 darts per action).

In theory, it is possible to get up to 16,200,000 experience per hour fletching dragon darts. However, doing this in practice is impossible without macros, as it requires ten sets to be fletched every 0.6 seconds, and one can expect to get up to 1–4 per tick by hand, depending on the player's dexterity, for 1,500,000–6,000,000 experience per hour respectively. Nonetheless, making dragon darts is the fastest method of training Fletching, although due to their price and limited supply, this is usually nonviable for long-term training.

Dragon dart tips are required for the Elite Desert Diary.

[[File:Dragon dart tip detail.png|left|60px]]
'''Dragon dart tips''' are used in the making of [[dragon dart]]s. At level 95 [[Fletching]], they can be made into dragon darts by adding [[feather]]s. Fletching a set of 10 will provide 250 experience (10 darts per action).

In theory, it is possible to get up to 16,200,000 experience per hour fletching dragon darts. However, doing this in practice is impossible without [[botting|macros]], as it requires ten sets to be fletched every [[RuneScape clock#Length of a tick|0.6 seconds]], and one can expect to get up to 1–4 per tick by hand, depending on the player's dexterity, for 1,500,000–6,000,000 experience per hour respectively. Nonetheless, making dragon darts is the fastest method of training Fletching, although due to their price and limited supply, this is usually nonviable for long-term training.

Dragon dart tips are required for the [[Elite Desert Diary]].
